div.p: No. 1512, p. 700, unit 25, VPRS 1187/P, outward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.

I have the honor by direction of the Chief Secretary to request that you will be good enough to inform Mr Ferguson of your Department that the papers in the matter of his being provided with quarters were referred to the Board of Inquiry on the Botanic Gardens who have not yet made any report.
